Title: Relates to the regulation of municipal shooting ranges
Summary: Relates to the regulation of municipal shooting ranges, including limiting the hours of operation and addressing noise pollution; directs the department of health to conduct a study describing the contaminants and other pollutants in the ground and water bodies adjacent to certain shooting ranges.
LawCode: Add ยง97-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to municipal shooting ranges; and directing the department of health to conduct a study describing the contaminants and other pollutants in the ground and water bodies adjacent to certain shooting ranges
